Title: I hate to use my account to promote something but Robinhood is telling me if I refer 10 friends they...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: I hate to use my account to promote something but Robinhood is telling me if I refer 10 friends they'll send me a solid gold credit card?! Maybe I'm misunderstanding something cause that's $2500 of gold. But I'm selling out for that.
